introduction.story_line: Ek din ek vikram jaisa hero tha. Jo apne vatan ke liye ladta tha. Lekin yeh vikram bahut hi dhoomadhaam tha. Woh har baar apni dada ke paas jata tha. Jiske paas yeh ek special power thi ki voh kisi bhi cheez ko utha kar phin sakta tha.
introduction.image_prompt: A hero in a funny costume standing in front of a map of India

main_plot.story_line: Ek din Vikram ka dada usse kaha ki aaj ek special mission hai. Kuchh vishayak cheezon ko uthana hai jo India ka khatra hain. Vikram ne isse manta aur usne apne mission ko suru kiya. Lekin yeh mission bahut hi mudda tha. Kyunki yeh cheezein bahut hi bade bade thapadon mein thi.
main_plot.image_prompt: Vikram standing in front of a giant obstacle, looking puzzled

climax.story_line: Vikram ne apne dada ki power ka upyog karke yeh cheezein uthaane ki koshish ki. Lekin har baar woh hataas hua. Kyunki yeh cheezein bahut hi bade bade the. Lekin Vikram ne nahi chhodaa. Usne apne dada ki power ko badha kar usey uthaane ka faisla kiya.
climax.image_prompt: Vikram with his arms outstretched, trying to lift a huge object

morale.story_line: Vikram ne apne dada ki power ko badha kar yeh cheezein uthaane ki koshish ki aur usey aasan se uthaane par usne kamaaya. Yeh ek bada mission tha. Lekin Vikram ne yeh mission jeet liya. Usne dikhaya ki agar tum ek bada mission ke liye taiyaar ho to koi bhi cheez tumhari khatir nahin hai.
morale.image_prompt: Vikram standing triumphantly in front of a crowd, with a huge object behind him
